main event: A witness observed a round object with a whitish glow and a trail of flame descending before it exploded.
interesting points: The object was described as being the size of a nickel at arm's length., The duration of the observation was about 45 seconds., The object exploded as it descended., The color and trail of flame suggest it was a meteor., The witness was a 17-year-old farmer from Howell, Utah.
sighted object: one round object with a whitish glow and a trail of flame
